Text.Page:
We've got more orders for you. We'll need you to get rid of the {@LinkCreature:19#3000#horned war} and {@LinkCreature:19#2000#battle hyenas} running around the Freeholds area.

Speak to Cardis when you've finished.
Great job. Thank you. Please take this for your effort.
I'll gladly give you a reward if you come back with a completed mission order.
